summary: Hello Kitty is a famous character from Japan, created in 1974 by the company Sanrio. She's a white cat with a red bow, living in London with her family. At first, she was for young girls, but now people of all ages love her. Her popularity grew with the "kawaii" trend and she's worth billions! Hello Kitty has her own theme parks, TV shows, movies, and you can find her on many products like clothes and toys. She's even an ambassador for UNICEF and Japanese tourism.
title: Hello Kitty
